Articles.Content:
Howdy!

Can you recommend mods that have 2 Kerbal (or more!) lander pods? There's just the one in the stock game and I'm bored with designing around that. I'm not interesting in single Kerbal pords or in pods that aren't specifically designed to be landers. I'm trying to go for an authentic look here.

Thanks!

Edited November 24, 2014 by johnnyhandsome

Now that I think about it, I honestly can think of too many mods that have any lander-specific pods. The one I know of is the Work-in-progress ALCOR mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925-WIP-ALCOR-Advanced-Landing-Capsule-for-Orbital-Rendezvous-by-ASET-%28UPD-30-06-2014%29 , and it is a good thing you said you wanted "authentic" because this is about as authentic as it gets, by which I mean intense. I have only watched videos myself but it is truly a thing of beauty, especially if you like IVA missions. It is designed to go along with the Raster Prop Monitor mod, and it also has about a thousand switches on the inside, many of which actually do things. It also comes with external cameras to place on your lander to help with docking and landing, which will subsequently feed to the monitors in your craft. I don't know that I've ever seen another mod with lander cans in it.

Also now that I'm looking at the page, it appears to be out of date, not updated since June so if you are in 0.25, you may be out of luck. Hopefully someone else will know of a mod with lander cans. I have seen various odd looking ones which could be used as landers but aren't authentic, such as the transparent pods here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83364-WIP-NohArk-s-Pick-and-Pull-Ambient-Occlusion-NOOOOOOOOOOOOO!?highlight=pick+pull

So looking some more I found these:

Bobcat looks to have a lander (no pictures here) in his American pack and possibly in his N-1 pack, since it is supposed to be a moon rocket, but it doesn't specifically say. Also not sure if it is up to date for 0.25.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81754-Release-BobCat-Ind-Space-Planet-products

This bubble ship includes a pretty cool looking 2 man cockpit that could be used for a sweet looking lander

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83488-!-0-25-Oblivion-Bubbleship-Drone166-%28Wayland-Corp-%29-Download

This one appears to have Russia's version of a moon lander, which was only for one person:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81537-0-25-Tantares-Stockalike-Soyuz-and-MIR-12-1-2-Crew-1-25m-Pod-R-7-Release!

And here is finally the one you are looking for!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/70557-APOLLO-%28SATURN-V-with-F1-J2-APOLLO-CSM-LEM-LLRV%29-by-OLDD-%28v-1-4-09-05-14%29

The Spacecraft pack from Near Future Technologies contains a 2.5m 2-Kerbal pod and a 3.75m 6-Kerbal pod. While they're not technically lander cans, the former has a rad IVA and the latter is quite squat. There's also a flat 2.5m engine cluster that is just begging to be used for a lander, as well as some aerodynamic landing legs.

The ALCOR capsule could be what you are looking for. It's actually a 3 man capsule, but it's much better looking than the stock 2-man lander. And the mod is for the capsule only - you don't need to download a bunch of stuff you don't need just to be able to use it.

Thread with more details and download here ; http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925-WIP-ALCOR-Advanced-Landing-Capsule-for-Orbital-Rendezvous-by-ASET-%28UPD-10-01-2014%29
I just came in here to recommend the ALCOR capsule too. It`s designed to work REALLY rell with RasterPropMonitors and is my `go to` capsule of choice
The ALCOR does look like something I'd love, thanks y'all!
